social_work: Successfully managed club activities and actively volunteered in events such as Hackathons and Bootcamps, showcasing Mycin (Technical Society) Member

projects.name: YouTube Clone
projects.description: Developed a YouTube web app using React.js, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. Optimized performance with caching, debouncing, and routing techniques. Implemented features such as a search bar, comments, and live chat in YouTube.

projects.name: Vanity
projects.description: Conceptualized and Implemented a platform to enhance mental health support for the LGBTQ+ community, fostering a sense of love and acceptance. Implemented Node.Js to create anonymous interaction rooms and chatbot feature for user assistance. Established database connections to enable users to file complaints against harassment with NGOs.

projects.name: RANN Sports Fest
projects.description: Developed a website for an Inter College Sports Fest, excelling as the Frontend Developer in creating the UI. Achieved 1500+ student registrations from various colleges in various sports, demonstrating effective outreach and engagement strategies. Demonstrated proficiency in frontend development, delivering a seamless user experience for the event.

experiences.description: Protut is an edtech startup dedicated to designing a platform that enhances technical projects and improves candidate evaluations. Developing the frontend of Protuts edtech platform using React.js, enhancing user experience, and optimizing functionality.

Acquired knowledge in Cyber Security fundamentals during the internship. Evaluated college network, pinpointed vulnerabilities and recommended enhanced cybersecurity framework. Designed a college campus network blueprint using Cisco Packet Tracer.
